titles.title: A resolution recognizing the life and the death of Daniel J. Evans, former Senator for the State of Washington.
A resolution recognizing the life and the death of Daniel J. Evans, former Senator for the State of Washington.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and an amended preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sorrow of the Senate upon the announcement of the death of Daniel J. Evans, former Senator for the state of Washington.
